meanings.definition: The quality of being suitable or appropriate.
meanings.sent1: Her suitabilities for the job were evident from her experience and skills.
meanings.sent2: The suitabilities of the dress for the occasion made her stand out.
meanings.sent3: His lack of suitabilities for the role of a comedian was quite comical.
meanings.sent4: The suitabilities of the puzzle pieces fit together perfectly.
meanings.sent5: The suitabilities of the candidate shone brightly during the interview.

meanings.definition: The state of being suitable or appropriate.
meanings.sent1: The suitabilities of the plan were questioned by the team.
meanings.sent2: She carefully considered the suitabilities of each option before making a decision.
meanings.sent3: The suitabilities of the outfit for the weather were spot on.
meanings.sent4: The suitabilities of the tools for the task were crucial for success.
meanings.sent5: His suitabilities for the leadership role were undeniable.

meanings.sent1: The various suitabilities of the candidates were taken into account.
meanings.sent2: She assessed the suitabilities of the different solutions available.
meanings.sent3: The suitabilities of the shoes for different occasions varied.
meanings.sent4: The suitabilities of the ingredients for the recipe were carefully measured.
meanings.sent5: Their suitabilities for the team were evident from their teamwork.
